sentence.Network_en: Interviews with politicians were juxtaposed with news items of quite astonishing triviality.
sentence.Network_cn: 对政治家的访谈与内容相当耸动的八卦新闻放在同一个版面。

sentence.Network_en: He was surprised by the triviality of her anxieties.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对琐碎小事的忧心忡忡使他感到惊讶.

sentence.Network_en: She wondered how a man like Mr. Casaubon would support such triviality.
sentence.Network_cn: 她心里纳闷,不明白卡苏朋先生这类人物对那些无稽之谈有什么想法.

entry.def: If you refer to something as a triviality, you think that it is unimportant and not serious.

example.ex: He accused me of making a great fuss about trivialities...
example.tran: 他指责我为丁点琐事大惊小怪。

example.ex: Interviews with politicians were juxtaposed with news items of quite astonishing triviality.
example.tran: 对政治家的访谈与内容相当耸动的八卦新闻放在同一个版面。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being unimportant and petty or frivolous
2. a detail that is considered insignificant

auth_sentence.content: Hunt and his friends rebelled against what they saw as the triviality of British art.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hunt and his friends rebelled against what they saw as the triviality of British art.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hunt and his friends rebelled against what they saw as the triviality of British art.

auth_sentence.content: They speculate on their own but modern science has since long moved beyond triviality of everyday conceptions.
auth_sentence.res_content: They speculate on their own but modern science has since long moved beyond triviality of everyday conceptions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They speculate on their own but modern science has since long moved beyond triviality of everyday conceptions.

auth_sentence.content: Compared to that, global warming & climate change are a minor triviality, a minor blip in the evolution of terrestrial life.
auth_sentence.res_content: Compared to that, global warming & climate change are a minor triviality, a minor blip in the evolution of terrestrial life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Compared to that, global warming & climate change are a minor triviality, a minor blip in the evolution of terrestrial life.
